## Enumerations

### enum class  {#a36a5e731a6e92a83c26e5fee63d12380}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum class llvm::coro::ABI "
 labels = {["strong"]}>

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a36a5e731a6e92a83c26e5fee63d12380abbc155fb2b111bf61c4f5ff892915e6b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Switch">
The &quot;resume-switch&quot; lowering, where there are separate resume and destroy functions that are shared between all suspend points
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a36a5e731a6e92a83c26e5fee63d12380aad9d7f07127e321d1358b695c8720166" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Retcon">
The &quot;returned-continuation&quot; lowering, where each suspend point creates a single continuation function that is used for both resuming and destroying
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a36a5e731a6e92a83c26e5fee63d12380a6ec6c15fe79ec2274d2c3e79ae4bcc41" />
<EnumerationListItem name="RetconOnce">
The &quot;unique returned-continuation&quot; lowering, where each suspend point creates a single continuation function that is used for both resuming and destroying
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a36a5e731a6e92a83c26e5fee63d12380a24aa4117da86c41684ad25742832dfa6" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Async">
The &quot;async continuation&quot; lowering, where each suspend point creates a single continuation function
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/coroutines/coroshape-h/#l00025">25</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/coroutines/coroshape-h">CoroShape.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### salvageDebugInfo() {#a14553297713bc2c6012758ee13a2b917}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::coro::salvageDebugInfo (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/argument">Argument</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;, 4 &gt; &amp; ArgToAllocaMap, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgvariableintrinsic">DbgVariableIntrinsic</a> &amp; DVI, bool IsEntryPoint)</>}>
Attempts to rewrite the location operand of debug intrinsics in terms of the coroutine frame pointer, folding pointer offsets into the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diexpression">DIExpression</a> of the intrinsic.

If the frame pointer is an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/argument">Argument</a>, store it into an alloca to enhance the debugability.
